channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pentagon chief Hegseth yanks Gen. Milley's security detail and clearance
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth told retired Army Gen. Mark A. Milley, the former chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, that he was revoking his secur...

item.title: Trump’s J6 Pardons Signal The End Of The War On Wrongthink
item.description: The Capitol riot fueled the war on wrongthink. Clemency for Capitol rioters should represent the start of the end of that war.

item.title: Trump AG pick Pam Bondi clears Judiciary Committee, will get confirmation vote in Senate
item.description: Pam Bondi, President Donald Trump's choice for attorney general, will get a vote on the Senate floor after the Judiciary Committee voted favorably on ...

item.title: Emilia Pérez — an Ode to Transgender Globalism
item.description: France’s commercial issue-hustler Jacques Audiard strikes again.

item.title: Trump fires two Democratic commissioners on civil rights enforcement agency as White House targets DEI
item.description: The White House fired Democrats Charlotte Burrows and Jocelyn Samuels from the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC), they each said.

item.title: SCOTUS To Decide If Parents Can Reject LGBT Brainwashing For Their Children
item.description: To protect their religious beliefs and their children's innocence, these Montgomery County parents are taking their fight to SCOTUS.

item.title: Multiple outbursts erupt at RFK Jr hearing: 'You are!'
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s Senate confirmation hearing to serve as the secretary of the Department of Health and Human Services was interrupted by protes...

item.title: Why Congress Needs To Swiftly Pass Concealed-Carry Reciprocity
item.description: Unlike other parts of the Constitution, the Second Amendment has been politicized to the point it is often treated as a second-class right.

item.title: DeepSeek fallout: GOP Sen Josh Hawley seeks to cut off all US-China collaboration on AI development
item.description: This week the U.S. tech sector was routed by the Chinese launch of DeepSeek, and Sen. Josh Hawley is putting forth legislation to prevent that from ha...

item.title: An American ‘Iron Dome’ Would Help the U.S. — and Our Allies
item.description: Trump’s team shouldn’t lose sight of the critical role homeland missile defense plays in protecting far-flung regions.

item.title: The New Fusionism of Wanting to Blow Stuff Up
item.description: Adherents may be from the right or left, but they share an overriding belief that ‘experts’ and elite institutions have royally messed things up.

item.title: Trump offers all federal workers an 8-month buyout to resign
item.description: President Trump continued his crusade to thin out the federal bureaucracy by offering all 3 million federal workers eight months' salary in exchange f...

item.title: WATCH: Congressional Republicans huddle on strategy, Trump agenda
item.description: Congressional Republicans are working to hash out a legislative strategy as the Trump administration takes shape.

item.title: Trump asks Musk to speed up the return of two NASA astronauts stuck at ISS
item.description: President Trump has directed SpaceX CEO Elon Musk to speed up the return of two U.S. astronauts awaiting retrieval on the International Space Station.

item.title: RFK Jr. Can Shore Up Support And Save Women With This Common-Sense Stance On Abortion Pills
item.description: Trump has said he is against restricting access to the abortion pill, but reinstating REMS doesn’t ‘restrict access.' It's the perfect middle ground f...

item.title: RFK Jr. and 'MAHA' movement face crunchtime in Senate
item.description: President Trump promised to let Robert F. Kennedy Jr. "go wild" on health. Mr. Kennedy will outline what that means at a high-stakes hearing Wednesday...

item.title: Pro-Lifers Should Vote No on RFK
item.description: HHS is too important a position for the Senate to confirm a pro-abortion secretary.

item.title: California Finally Ends Political Prosecution Of Journalists Who Uncovered Aborted Baby Parts Trafficking
item.description: The Center for Medical Progress recorded Planned Parenthood abortionists telling how they harvest and sell babies' bodies for profit and research.

item.title: Taiwan and America, &c.
item.description: On tariff wars; a farce in Belarus; an honest congressman; Taylor Swift and the Super Bowl; and more.
